candidates.definition: Appliances designed for individual personal care, grooming, or fitness use.

positive_examples: She plugged in her hair dryer before styling her hair.
The electric toothbrush charged overnight on the bathroom counter.
He used his massage gun after the workout to relax his muscles.
The facial steamer helped open her pores during her skincare routine.
She adjusted the settings on her curling iron for loose waves.
The electric shaver provided a smooth, close shave every morning.
negative_examples: The washing machine finished the laundry cycle with a beep.
She preheated the oven to 350 degrees for baking cookies.
The dishwasher ran quietly while they watched television.
He started the blender to make his morning protein shake.
The air conditioner kept the bedroom cool during summer nights.
She loaded dishes into the microwave to reheat dinner.
training_hints.disambiguation: Not to be confused with: KitchenAppliances, LaundryAppliances, ClimateAppliances, CleaningAppliances

candidates.definition: Electric or mechanical devices designed specifically for food preparation, cooking, or processing in a kitchen environment.

positive_examples: She used her new blender to make a smoothie for breakfast.
The pressure cooker made the tough roast tender in just an hour.
He grilled the vegetables on his countertop electric grill.
The bread machine finished baking a fresh loaf overnight.
She processed the nuts in her food processor to make almond butter.
The slow cooker simmered the stew all day while we were at work.
negative_examples: The washing machine finished the laundry cycle.
She vacuumed the living room carpet thoroughly.
The air conditioner kept the house cool all summer.
He used a hammer to fix the loose cabinet door.
The dishwasher cleaned all the plates and glasses.
She ironed her shirt before the important meeting.
training_hints.disambiguation: Not to be confused with: LaundryAppliances, CleaningAppliances, HeatingAppliances, PersonalCareAppliances

candidates.definition: Appliances designed to clean, wash, dry, or maintain cleanliness of items or spaces.

positive_examples: She loaded the dirty dishes into the dishwasher after dinner.
The vacuum cleaner picked up all the pet hair from the carpet.
He threw his muddy clothes into the washing machine.
The dryer finished its cycle and the towels were perfectly dry.
She set up the ironing board to press her wrinkled shirt.
The air purifier's filter needs to be replaced monthly.
negative_examples: The refrigerator kept the food fresh and cold.
She preheated the oven to bake chocolate chip cookies.
He used a hammer to hang the picture on the wall.
The microwave heated up the leftover pizza quickly.
She plugged in the hair dryer to style her hair.
The lawn mower cut the grass in neat rows.
training_hints.disambiguation: Not to be confused with: KitchenAppliances, HeatingAppliances, CoolingAppliances, PersonalCareAppliances

candidates.definition: Appliances that control air temperature, humidity, or circulation in indoor environments.

positive_examples: The heater kicked on automatically when the temperature dropped below 68 degrees.
We installed a new air conditioning unit to keep the office cool during summer.
The ventilation system circulates fresh air throughout the building.
She adjusted the thermostat to make the room more comfortable.
The humidifier helps maintain proper moisture levels in the nursery.
Our HVAC system efficiently controls both heating and cooling.
negative_examples: The refrigerator keeps our food fresh and cold.
She used the hair dryer to style her hair quickly.
The washing machine finished the laundry cycle.
He plugged in the vacuum cleaner to clean the carpet.
The microwave heated up the leftover pizza.
The dishwasher sanitizes and cleans our dishes.
training_hints.disambiguation: Not to be confused with: KitchenAppliances, CleaningAppliances, LaundryAppliances, PersonalCareAppliances

candidates.definition: Appliances that provide essential home services like heating, ventilation, water management, or safety monitoring rather than food preparation or entertainment.

positive_examples: The smoke detector started beeping when the battery ran low.
We installed a new water heater in the basement last month.
The range hood helps remove cooking odors from the kitchen.
The sprinkler system automatically waters the lawn every morning.
Our HVAC unit keeps the house comfortable year-round.
The toilet needed repair after the handle broke.
negative_examples: She used the microwave to heat up her lunch.
The television displayed the evening news clearly.
He mixed the cake batter with an electric mixer.
The washing machine finished the laundry cycle.
She played her favorite song on the stereo system.
The refrigerator kept the milk cold overnight.
training_hints.disambiguation: Not to be confused with: KitchenAppliances, EntertainmentAppliances, CleaningAppliances, PersonalCareAppliances

candidates.definition: Appliances designed for work, communication, or specialized tasks in office or home work environments.

positive_examples: She bought a new printer for her home office setup.
The fax machine in the corner hasn't been used in months.
He threaded the sewing machine to finish the alterations.
The phone system allows conference calls with multiple participants.
She used the laminator to protect important documents.
The paper shredder helps maintain document confidentiality.
negative_examples: The refrigerator keeps our lunch fresh in the break room.
She turned on the microwave to heat her coffee.
The air conditioner keeps the office comfortable in summer.
He vacuumed the carpet in his home office.
The dishwasher in the office kitchen needs repair.
She plugged in the space heater under her desk.
training_hints.disambiguation: Not to be confused with: KitchenAppliances, CleaningAppliances, HeatingCoolingAppliances, LaundryAppliances

candidates.definition: Appliances designed to enhance leisure experiences through visual display, ambiance, or aesthetic appeal.

positive_examples: The new smart TV has excellent picture quality for movie nights.
She dimmed the decorative string lights to create a cozy atmosphere.
The disco ball spun slowly, casting sparkles across the dance floor.
He adjusted the lamp's brightness while reading his book.
The neon sign in the window attracted customers to the restaurant.
They installed LED strip lights behind the TV for ambient lighting.
negative_examples: The dishwasher finished its cleaning cycle with a beep.
She preheated the oven to 350 degrees for baking cookies.
The washing machine spun the clothes dry in the final cycle.
He used the microwave to reheat his leftover dinner.
The air conditioner kept the room cool during the heat wave.
The refrigerator's ice maker produced fresh cubes automatically.
training_hints.disambiguation: Not to be confused with: KitchenAppliances, CleaningAppliances, ClimateAppliances, LaundryAppliances
